Let me add to this, that every activation function carries its own 
number =
of input/output variables. This has to be identified by the 
code, so a mut=
ation that changes activation function will not be a 
problem.

t 
> > the

n

ound

rdinate frame 
that

ound a circle in 2D as well.  In other words:

f(x,y)=3Da point in this circular petal-like gradient
> > > > > > >

g. the x axis and then
